00020 #include <map>
00021 
00022 #include <rdkcore/logging/logging.h>
00023 #define LOGGING_MODULE "ObjectManager"
00024 
00025 #include "objectmanager.h"
00026 
00027 
00028 namespace RDK2 { namespace Meta {
00029 
00030     Class2prot& getClass2prot() {
00031         static Class2prot c;
00032         return c;
00033     }
00034 }}
00035 
00036 namespace RDK2 { namespace Meta {
00037     using namespace std;
00038     
00039 
00040     Factory::Factory(const RDK2::Object*prototype) {
00041         Class2prot& class2prot = getClass2prot();
00042         string name = prototype->getClassName();
00043         
00044         Class2prot::iterator i = class2prot.find(name);
00045         if(i!=class2prot.end()) {
00046             RDK_ERROR_STREAM("Class "<<name<<" already present in database");
00047             return;
00048         }
00049         
00050         RDK2::Object * clone =  prototype->clone();
00051         if(!clone) {
00052             RDK_ERROR_STREAM("Class " << name << " does not support clone().\n"<<
00053                 "Not added to database");
00054             return;
00055         } 
00056         
00057         string name2 = clone->getClassName();
00058         if(name2 != name) {
00059             RDK_ERROR_STREAM("getClassName() on class " << name << " returns '"
00060                 << name2 <<"'. \nNot added to database.");
00061             return;
00062         }
00063         delete clone;
00064         
00065         class2prot[name] = prototype;
00066 //       RDK_INFO_STREAM("Class " << name << " initialized.");
00067     }
00068     
00069     RDK2::Object * forName(cstr name) {
00070         Class2prot& class2prot = getClass2prot();
00071         Class2prot::iterator i = class2prot.find(name);
00072         if(i==class2prot.end()) {
00073             RDK_ERROR_STREAM("Class "<<name<<" is not present in database");
00074             return 0;
00075         }
00076         RDK2::Object * clone = i->second->clone();
00077         
00078         if(!clone) {
00079             RDK_ERROR_STREAM("Could not clone class "<<name);
00080             return 0;
00081         }
00082         
00083         return clone;
00084     }
00085     
00086     void freePrototypeDb()
00087     {
00088         Class2prot& c2p = getClass2prot();
00089         for (Class2prot::iterator it = c2p.begin(); it != c2p.end(); ++it) {
00090             delete it->second;
00091         }
00092         c2p.clear();
00093     }
00094 
00095 }} // namespace RDK2::Object
